ARABIC: إِن تُبْدُوا۟ شَيْـًٔا أَوْ تُخْفُوهُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Whether you divulge a thing or conceal it, Allah has knowledge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Whether you discuss a thing or conceal it, surely God has knowledge of everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (It does not matter) whether you disclose something or conceal it, for Allah certainly knows everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Whether you reveal something or hid it, God has the knowledge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Whether you disclose a thing or keep it hidden – then indeed Allah knows all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Whether you reveal anything or conceal it, verily, Allah is Ever All-Knower of everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: If you do a thing openly or do it in secret, then surely Allah is Cognizant of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Whether you reveal anything, or whether you conceal it, surely God has knowledge of everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Whether ye divulge a thing or keep it hidden, lo! Allah is ever Knower of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Whether you reveal anything or hide it, God is aware of everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Whether ye disclose a thing or conceal it, verily Allah is of everything ever Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Whether you disclose anything or hide it, Allah indeed knows all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Whether ye reveal anything or conceal it, verily Allah has full knowledge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Whether you reveal anything or conceal it, verily, Allah is Ever AllKnower of everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Whether you reveal a thing or conceal it, Allah has knowledge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Whether you declare a thing, or hide it, God is Aware of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Whether you reveal a thing or conceal it, indeed Allah is ever, of all things, Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:54] Whether you disclose anything or keep it hidden, regarding marrying them after him, truly God has knowledge of all things, and will requite you for it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Whether ye divulge a thing) of this intent (or keep it hidden, lo! Allah is ever Knower) He takes you to task (of all things) regarding all things, whether they are made public or kept hidden.
